Sakura attacks the opponent four times, and then with the help of [[Inner Sakura]], she delivers twenty fast and powerful punches. She then kicks the opponent twice, sending them flying away. 
 
== Trivia == 
* In the ''[[Clash of Ninja]]'' series, [[Kakashi]] can perform this technique by copying it with his [[Sharingan]].
* In Clash of Ninja 1, after Sakura uppercuts the opponent before striking them with the barrage, she screams after she starts doing it. In [[Naruto: Clash of Ninja 2|Clash of Ninja 2]] and further sequels, she screams during the uppercut.

[[es:Bombardeo Cha]]
[[pl:Shannarō Rendan]]
